doc.after: France was one of the first countries to create an environment ministry in 1971 74 Although it is one of the most industrialised countries in the world France is ranked only 17th by carbon dioxide emissions behind less populous nations such as Canada or Australia This is due to France s decision to invest in nuclear power following the 1973 oil crisis 75 which now accounts for 75 of its electricity production 76 and results in less pollution 77 78
